subject: ARTH
name: Why Art Matters
info: Introduction to history of topics that investigate power/importance of art both globablly and in its diverse forms, from architecture/painting to video/prints. Sacred space, propaganda, the museum, art/gender, art/authority, tourism.

subject: ARTH
name: Honors: Asian Art
info: Issues/themes of South Asian, Southeast Asian, East Asian art from earliest times to present.

subject: ARTH
name: Art of India
info: Indian sculpture, architecture, and painting from the prehistoric Indus Valley civilization to the present day.

subject: ARTH
name: Honors: Junior-Senior Seminar
info: Major art-historical theme, artist, period, or genre.prereq: Honors [jr or sr] ArtH major

subject: ARTH
name: Honors: Art History Capstone
info: Capstone course for art history majors, which teaches writing skills and strategies, and aids students in the completion of senior paper projects through the study of art historical methods. Students work with both the class instructor and individual faculty advisers on independent research and writing.
